column1: Les Pennes-Mirabeau is a commune in the Bouches-du-Rhône department in southern France
column2: located 13.5 km (8.4 mi) from Marseille. In May every year
column3: a medieval festival attracts tens of thousands people.

column2: Nagorno-Karabakh: Les Pennes-Mirabeau and Khojavend became sister cities on 11 June 2013.
